NK103(pe)005:1: // pa sha n+aa s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ////
NK103(pe)005:4: sarba d+har+m+aake pa lampa ri p+aur+namd+har+m+aaa nu sa riprada t+y+aat+ma be da n+aiyo bida nyeep+aa sha n+aan+aa ma /
NK103(pe)005:6: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cadma 'dres pas 'khor ba
NK103(pe)005:7: las grol layongs su rdzogs pas 'das palas grol bar
NK103(pe)005:8: bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rtog
NK103(pe)005:9: ldan mkhas parnams kyi tshad ma gsum kyisngang gis yul
NK103(pe)005:10: med rang gsal du rtogs par bya ba'i thabs lta
NK103(pe)005:12: legs pa'i bdag nyid dpal spyod yul yongs su dag
NK103(pe)005:13: pas kun tu bzang po la 'dun pa'i tshig phyag
NK103(pe)005:14: 'tshal lo thun mong khyad par gyis //
NK103(pe)005:15: 'khor 'das kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos kun gyi
NK103(pe)005:16: phyogs kyi mtha' las grol cing shes bya kun ma
NK103(pe)005:17: bcos rang gsal du rang grol bar gnas kyang //
NK103(pe)005:18: ma rtogs te rang snang bas yul du grub pa
NK103(pe)005:19: min cing rkyen bzhi dang bral bas lhan skyes byung
NK103(pe)005:21: bdag gzhan tha dad du snang ba las kun brtags
NK103(pe)005:22: zhes bya zhing rgyu de la nyon mongs lnga dang
NK103(pe)005:23: las gsum gyi rkyen kyis dkrugs pas //
NK103(pe)005:24: zhen pa 'gro ba drug rten 'brel gyi 'khor lo
NK103(pe)005:25: ru 'khor zhing sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyi d+r+wa
NK103(pe)005:26: bar tshud // nyan thos spong rang rgyal 'gegs byang
NK103(pe)005:27: sems sbyong phyi rgyud sgyur ma h+aa'i rtsol sgrub a
NK103(pe)005:29: sdug bsngal dang rtsol ba'i nad kyis 'khor ba las //
NK103(pe)005:30: lhun grub gsum ma 'dres par sku gsum du rtogs
NK103(pe)005:31: pas 'khor ba'i chos shes pa gsum gyi mtha' las
NK103(pe)005:33: de dag yongs rdzogs dbyer med du rtogs pas myang
NK103(pe)005:34: 'das sku gsum gyi mthar mi gnas par grol bar
NK103(pe)005:35: bya ba'i phyir // dad pa tsam las mi ldan
NK103(pe)005:36: pa gang zag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i lung tsam
NK103(pe)005:38: rtog ldan chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i mi bslu
NK103(pe)005:39: bas tshad ma lung man ngag rigs pa rnam pa
NK103(pe)005:40: gsum gyis // ma bcos par ye nas gnas pa de yul med rang gsal du //
NK103(pe)005:41: rtogs par bya ba ni thabs lta bar chos kun
NK103(pe)005:42: 'dus pas sel med pa'i klong de bstan 0par bya'o
NK103(pe)005:44: 0de la yang shes par bya ba'i gzhi dang rtogs par byed pa'i thabs tshad ma gsum dang //
NK103(pe)005:45: ngo bo mnyam nyid du rig pa dang /
NK103(pe)005:46: mtshan nyid phyogs ris las grol ba dang mtshon pa'i nges tshig gnyis med kun gsal dang //
NK103(pe)005:47: rnam grangs kyis nor ma nor gyi dmigs bsal ba dang gdeng bzang ngan med pa dang /
NK103(pe)005:48: srog dgag sgrub dang bral ba dang /
NK103(pe)005:49: nyams kyi rim pa lnga dang //
NK103(pe)005:50: mtshon dpe ma spangs rang grol dang dgos pa rtsol
NK103(pe)005:51: ba las grol ba dang yon tan rang gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)005:52: don grub pa dang skyon 'khor ba las mi grol
NK103(pe)005:53: ba'o // sgro skur dang bral bar nges par dngos
NK103(pe)005:54: po'i gnas lugs shes bya'i gshis kyi rang bzhin ni
NK103(pe)005:55: ba'o // // mu matha'i ngos gzung dang phyogs ris kun gyis ye nas dben pa //
NK103(pe)005:56: de nyid mkhyen pa'i rang rig pa'i ye shes rang gsal la //
NK103(pe)005:57: de'i rnam pa'i rang 'od mu mtha' cir yang ma 'gags par shar //
NK103(pe)005:58: ba gsum ngo bos dbyer med byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por gnas kyang //
NK103(pe)005:59: chos nyid rang snang yin pas yul du byar med cing rtog pa'i rkyen bzhi dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)005:60: de nyid ngo ma shes shing bdag tu brtags pas 'khrul pa'i snang ba rgyas //
NK103(pe)005:61: gshis kyi yin lugs de la yul du grub pa
NK103(pe)005:62: med pas zhen brtags kyi snang yul rnams 'gag pa'i
NK103(pe)005:63: phyir // 'khor 'das kyi dngos por zhen pa'i ngo na snang ba dang /
NK103(pe)005:64: 'jig rten 'dir grags tshad la gzhal lo //
NK103(pe)005:65: rgyal ba'i lung dang bla ma'i man ngag dang rang
NK103(pe)005:66: rig pa'i nyams tshad ma dang gsum gyis gzhal te
NK103(pe)005:67: // rang rig gi blo dang 'tsham tshad dus 'dir
NK103(pe)005:68: rgyud nas drang ba'i thabs chen po'i lung theg brgyad
NK103(pe)005:69: // gis // nges pa'i don gyis mtshon par byed
NK103(pe)005:70: pa bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung bam po nyi khri
NK103(pe)005:71: // gis // ba // des mtshon par bya ba mkha' khyab byang chub sems kyi lung gis1 //
NK103(pe)005:72: rdzogs chen gyi skal ba dang ldan cing snod kyi
NK103(pe)005:73: skyon bzhi dang bral na shes bya gtan la phebs
NK103(pe)005:74: // rgyud kyi ston pa'i gdul bya'i rigs su nges pa yin na nges pa'i shes pa 'char ba'o //
NK103(pe)005:75: lung de la yid ches par dmigs nas snyan rgyud kyi gdams pas rgyud dgrol te //
NK103(pe)005:76: thun mong khyad par gyi dbang thob cing lung gsum
NK103(pe)005:77: gyi tshig lam mkhyen pa rgyud rang grol gyi gdams
NK103(pe)005:78: pa'i rig pa shar ba man ngag /
NK103(pe)005:79: rang gi gshis sgro skur dang bral bar mngon sum
NK103(pe)005:80: du grub pa'i thob kyi chu bo ste bzhi rdzogs
NK103(pe)005:82: skal ldan snod skyon dang bral ba'i rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i sras kyi slob ma des //
NK103(pe)005:83: dad pa dang mos pa dang gus pas zhus te bla ma'i thugs rjes gnang ba'i //
NK103(pe)005:84: yi ge dkyus 1kyi man ngag dang snyan brgyud zhal gyi /
NK103(pe)005:86: nges par the tshom med par yid ches 1blo'i gdeng du phebs 1par 11bya'o //
NK103(pe)005:87: rang rig pa'i nyams tshad ma'i sgro skur bsal la nges pa'i don la gnas par bya ste //
NK103(pe)005:88: snang grags kyi chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su lhun gyis grub par gnas pa de //
NK103(pe)005:89: rigs pa bzhi yis sgro skur dang the tshom bsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)005:90: dper na bsregs pas gser yin min bcad pas zol
NK103(pe)005:91: yod med bdar bas kha bzang ngan gyi sa'i gser
NK103(pe)005:93: chos nyid dang bya ba byed pa dang ltos shar dang 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang bzhi'o //
NK103(pe)005:94: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos /
NK103(pe)005:95: cing chos can gyi ngo bos khyad par gyi chos 'dzin pas chos //
NK103(pe)005:96: snang grags myong rigs gi chos la rigs pas bden
NK103(pe)005:97: pa'i don 'dzin pas chos dge ba'i las rnam par
NK103(pe)005:98: dkar spyod kyis // ngan song du ltung ba las
NK103(pe)005:99: 'dzin pas chos te bzhi po de dag gi gnas
NK103(pe)005:100: dkar spyod kyis // lugs nyid ni // rang bzhin
NK103(pe)005:101: mu matha'i spros pa kun dang bral ba nyid du
NK103(pe)005:102: dkar spyod kyis // lugs nyid ni // nges te
NK103(pe)005:103: // de mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rang rig pa'i ye
NK103(pe)005:105: de yi rang 'od kyi rnam pa thugs rje'i sprul par ma 'gags par shar //
NK103(pe)005:106: snang la rang bzhin med pa sgyu ma'i rtsal 'dzin
NK103(pe)005:107: kyang 'dus ma byas pas rdo rje mi 'jigs pas
NK103(pe)005:108: btsan po khyad par du gyur pas mchog yin //
NK103(pe)005:109: de gsum gdod ma nas 'du ba dang 'bral ba med par lhun grub tu rdzogs pa che //
NK103(pe)005:110: de min yod med gnyis gnyis med kyi mu bzhi
NK103(pe)005:111: dang skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro 'ong gcig du ma'i
NK103(pe)005:113: cir yang 'char ba'i mi rigs pa la de dag tu 'char ba de yi phyir //
NK103(pe)005:114: chos de rnams kyi chos nyid gnas lugs der 0 rigs pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:115: gnas skabs kyi chos nyid 'khrul pa'i snang ba rang gi mtshan nyid ni //
NK103(pe)005:116: sa la sra ba chu la gsher ba me la
NK103(pe)005:117: tsha ba rlung la yang zhing g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)005:118: // zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid kun nas mnar sems
NK103(pe)005:119: pa gti mug rmongs pa 'dod zhe na nga khengs
NK103(pe)005:120: // la sogs pa // de dag kun nas mtshan
NK103(pe)005:121: nyid ma 'dres par ye gnas so sor shar bas
NK103(pe)005:123: kun la yod pas spyi'i mtshan nyid de de yang
NK103(pe)005:124: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag zag pa dang bcas
NK103(pe)005:125: pa sdug bsngal chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med
NK103(pe)005:126: pa'o // mnyam grol gyi ngang du mu mtha' kun
NK103(pe)005:127: mnyam par rdzogs pa'i klong las rang rang gi 'dod
NK103(pe)005:128: pa'o // pa blangs pa'i // gnas lugs chos nyid
NK103(pe)005:129: kyi rigs pas rang ji ltar 'dod pa de'i don
NK103(pe)005:130: pa'o // pa blangs pa'i // grub pa'o // chos
NK103(pe)005:131: nyid de gnas pas na de las 'char ba'i gzhi
NK103(pe)005:132: pa'o // pa blangs pa'i // grub pa'o // byas
NK103(pe)005:133: nas // ma shes shing ngar 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa
NK103(pe)005:134: tha dad kyis rtog pa shar //
NK103(pe)005:135: sgo lngas mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i yul dang yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:136: dngos po dang mtshan mar 'char zhing mu matha'i phyogs
NK103(pe)005:137: char rtog /'char gzhi de med na 'khrul pa 'char
NK103(pe)005:138: ba de mi 'byung bas gnas lugs de nyid bya
NK103(pe)005:139: ba byed pa'i rigs pa ltar la //
NK103(pe)005:140: 'khrul pa'i snang ba ni gzhi gnas lugs de la
NK103(pe)005:141: ltos te phyin ci log tu brtags nas shar bas
NK103(pe)005:142: // chos nyid ni 'khrul pa 'byung ba'i bya ba
NK103(pe)005:143: byed cing 'khrul pa ni de la ltos nas mngon
NK103(pe)005:145: gnas skabs kyi bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni rang gi rgyu dang rkyen de tshogs pas //
NK103(pe)005:146: 'bras bu tha dad mngon par grub pa'ang de la ltos pa'i rigs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)005:147: rigs pa gsum po de yi 'thad pa sgrub pa la sgra dang tshad ma'i chos gnyis so //
NK103(pe)005:148: don ni rang gi shes bya la ming ngo bo
NK103(pe)005:149: mtshon pa la tshig khyad par mtshon pa la dang
NK103(pe)005:150: yi ge gnyis char gyi gzhir 'jug pa ste //
NK103(pe)005:151: ngag tu brjod pa'i mtha' las brjod bya'i don dang
NK103(pe)005:152: nges par spyi'i rnam pa'i sgo nas 'brel ba dang
NK103(pe)005:153: // sgra mthun pa'i grags pas 'brel pas grub cing
NK103(pe)005:154: grags pa'am 'brel yul kyang mthun par nges dgos te
NK103(pe)005:155: // // brda byed pa'i dus na don spyi'i shes
NK103(pe)005:156: pa la khyad par du byed pa'i chos lnga ldan
NK103(pe)005:157: dgos te de yang don la dmigs shing sgra las
NK103(pe)005:158: // // byung / ba'i shes pa la brda ston
NK103(pe)005:159: pa po dang gzhan dag mthun par snang ba'i don
NK103(pe)005:160: la brda ston pa'i sgra de gzhan dang thun mong
NK103(pe)005:161: du grags pa'i sgra las byung nas //
NK103(pe)005:162: 'di'i ming 'di yin zhes mngon par zhen na brda
NK103(pe)005:163: de yis don rtogs pas 'thad par sgrub la yan
NK103(pe)005:164: lag gcig nyams kyang mi 'grub bo //
NK103(pe)005:165: tshad ma mngon sum kadang rjes su dpag khapas kyang //
NK103(pe)005:166: don ka rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi yi rnam pa de rtogs par 'thad pas sgrub pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:167: yul snang ba la mtshan mar mi rtog don gyi gnas lugs la ma 'khrul bar //
NK103(pe)005:168: rnam shes sgo mig rna ba sna lce lus lngas
NK103(pe)005:169: yul gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya lnga rnam pa
NK103(pe)005:170: sgyu mar gcad // sprul sku sdug bsngal rtsol sgrub
NK103(pe)005:171: dang bcas pa'i dus kyi tshe brda don sprad pas
NK103(pe)005:172: sgyu mar gcad // nges shes 'char // sprul pa'i
NK103(pe)005:173: sku ma btsal bar gdod nas gnas pa dbang po'i
NK103(pe)005:174: mngon sum gyi 'thad pas grub bo //
NK103(pe)005:175: yid kyi ye shes ni sngar gyi bya ba zin
NK103(pe)005:176: pa dang phyis kyi bya ba ma bzung ba'i bar
NK103(pe)005:177: na // spros pa'i rang bzhin nyid spros pa dang bral ba nyid du ngo yis zin pa ni //
NK103(pe)005:178: blo yul du ma grub pas chos sku bsam gyis
NK103(pe)005:179: mi khyab pa'i dus su nges pa'i shes pa 'char
NK103(pe)005:180: // chos kyi sku ma btsal bar lhun grub ye
NK103(pe)005:181: nas gnas pa yid kyi mngon sum gyis 'thad pas
NK103(pe)005:182: // grub bo // rang rig mngon sum du ngar 'dzin cing nyon mongs pa lnga skyes pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)005:183: de'i don sings kyis rig la yul yul can gang du'ang mi rtog par //
NK103(pe)005:184: rang rig pa bde ba chen po shar ba'i dus su nges pa'i shes pa 'char //
NK103(pe)005:185: longs sku ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub par ye
NK103(pe)005:186: nas gnas pa rang rig pa'i mngon sum du 'thad
NK103(pe)005:187: pas grub pa'o // rang rig pa stong pa nyid sprul pa'i rnam pa can //
NK103(pe)005:188: du rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas tshogs bdun las
NK103(pe)005:189: grol te bag chags kyi rnyog gzhi sbyor don rang
NK103(pe)005:190: dwangs // rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum shin tu yongs
NK103(pe)005:191: su rdzogs par gsal ba ni sku gsum lhun gyis
NK103(pe)005:193: tshogs brgyad kyi rtog pa rang sar grol nas kun
NK103(pe)005:194: mkhyen gyi ye shes ma 'khrul bas 'thad pa grub
NK103(pe)005:195: bo // de ltar ma 'dres yongs rdzogs kyi rang
NK103(pe)005:196: gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du rdzogs par chig chod
NK103(pe)005:197: du rtogs ma nus pa la ni //
NK103(pe)005:198: 'khrul pa'i snang ba ni 'bras bu yin la de'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu de yod pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)005:199: byang ba rang bzhin chub pa rnam pa sems mtshan nyid de chos can //
NK103(pe)005:200: gsum ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub pa ye nas gnas par dam bca' 'bras bus rjes su dpag /
NK103(pe)005:201: rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad yul brgyad dang bcas pa yi //
NK103(pe)005:203: ye nas rang bzhin stong la mtshan nyid gsal cing sprul pa'i rnam par bcas pa las //
NK103(pe)005:204: nor ba med he tuhpasa ma bcos pa yin te
NK103(pe)005:205: dam bca' zhes rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis dpag
NK103(pe)005:206: go // 'khru la pa'i shes pa tshogs brgyad yul dang bcas pa de nyid bden pa yin na //
NK103(pe)005:207: de mthong ba yis grol bar rigs te de nyid rang sdug bsngal bas bden pa min no //
NK103(pe)005:208: rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul dang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:209: rnal 'byor pa'i dgongs pa ste yang dag pa'i shes
NK103(pe)005:210: pa gsum gyi ngo na de mi dmigs pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)005:211: // nges pa'i don du na gshis la'ang ma grub
NK103(pe)005:212: ste dam bca' zhes mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis
NK103(pe)005:213: // de rjes dpag / gnas skabs tsam du 'khrul snang gi rigs pas yul dang shes pa //
NK103(pe)005:214: snang bar grub kyang bden cing nges pa'i rigs pas de mi thad de //
NK103(pe)005:215: shes pa 'khrul pa'i ngor 'thad pa'i phyir bden pa'i don dang 'gal bar nges pa ni //
NK103(pe)005:216: dper na thag pa sbrul du 'dzin pa'i shes pa 'khrul ba yin pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)005:217: tha snyad dang tshig gi sgro skur rnams rigs pa bzhi po des bsal la //
NK103(pe)005:218: nges pa'i don du rang rig pa'i nyams la gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)005:219: mtshan ma dang kun rdzob kyi zhen pa las grol ba'i //
NK103(pe)005:220: mu mtha' kun dang bral la ji yang ma spangs pa'i rang rig pa la //
NK103(pe)005:221: chos thams cad yul med par kun gsal cing stong pa nyid yin de //
NK103(pe)005:222: zhes bstan pa de yang gzhan sel don gnyer gyi
NK103(pe)005:223: dgos pas tha snyad du btags te brjod pa tsam
NK103(pe)005:224: du zad do // gnas pa dang mi g.yo ba
NK103(pe)005:225: dang mnyam ba nyid kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i nyams
NK103(pe)005:226: du zad do // dang bzhi'o // rim pa med
NK103(pe)005:227: pas cig car dang bar du dor bas thod rgal
NK103(pe)005:228: dang snga phyi rim gyis shar ba'o //
NK103(pe)005:229: shes bya'i don la bden brdzun du gcod pa rang rig pa'i gang gis ye shes kyis //
NK103(pe)005:230: gang gcod 'khor 'das snang grags myong rig pa'i //
NK103(pe)005:231: gang la tshogs brgyad yul dang bcas pa 'di //
NK103(pe)005:232: mtshan nyid gang ltar gsal ba dang rang bzhin stong
NK103(pe)005:233: pa dang rnam par sprul pa gsum ma 'dres par
NK103(pe)005:234: gsal te // de yang ngos gzung las 'das pa'i ye shes su //
NK103(pe)005:235: 'khor 'das kyi rang bzhin dbyer med do //
NK103(pe)005:236: tshul de ltar du mkhyen pa'i rang rig pa ni
NK103(pe)005:237: shes bya kun la khyab la de dag dang ma
NK103(pe)005:239: de yi rnam 'phrul mi 'gag par rol pa'i chos sna tshogs su //
NK103(pe)005:240: sprul pas rang gzhan gyi don rnams grub ste rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:241: de dag yongs su rdzogs pas dbyer med la gcig tu 'dres pa'ang min //
NK103(pe)005:242: gcig dang tha dad kyi mtshan nyid las grol ba ni mtshan nyid do //
NK103(pe)005:243: de nyid mtshon par byed pa'i tshig don 'brel legs pa'i ming gi nges pa'i tshig ni //
NK103(pe)005:244: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa nyid rig pa la //
NK103(pe)005:245: lta bar byed pa dang blta bar byar med par //
NK103(pe)005:246: chos kun gyi rang bzhin gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir lta zhes bya bar ming nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:247: de yang dbye na yod pa dngos po dang med pa stong pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:248: bden pa gnyis dang de gnyis su med pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:249: mu bzhi kun rdzogs pa dang mu bzhi kun las 'das pa ste //
NK103(pe)005:250: zhes drug nga bdag tu lta ba dang rtag pa nga yi dngos po yod par lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)005:251: gang zag gi bdag de dang bral la gzung ba
NK103(pe)005:252: rdul phra rab dang 'dzin pa skad cig ma yi
NK103(pe)005:253: // chos tsam gyi dngos po yod par lta ba nyan thos pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:254: phyi gzung ba dang bral la nang 'dzin pa yi //
NK103(pe)005:255: dngos po tsam du lta ba rang rgyal dang //
NK103(pe)005:256: gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa'i shes pa gnyis ni yod pa min la //
NK103(pe)005:257: rang rig kho na'i dngos por lta ba sems tsam pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:258: tshe snga phyi dang las rgyu 'bras kyi stong par lta ba rigs pa can dang //
NK103(pe)005:259: nges par legs pa 'bras bu byang chub gsum gyis stong par lta ba spyod pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:260: chos snang thams cad kyis stong par lta ba lung gi phyogs tsam pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:261: don dam par na de kho na nyid spros pa brgyad dang bral la //
NK103(pe)005:262: kun rdzob tsam du dngos po cir yang snang ba //
NK103(pe)005:263: de gnyis shin tu gcig pa'am tha dad pa min
NK103(pe)005:264: te de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med par
NK103(pe)005:265: // thabs kun rdzob dang shes rab don dam tu lta ba dbu ma pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:266: kun rdzob tu snang ba 'di lha rin chen pad+ma rdo rje'i rigs gsum gyi ye shes pa //
NK103(pe)005:267: rje dang dam tshig pa 'bangs 'dra don dam par //
NK103(pe)005:268: mtha' bzhis dag pa'i mtha' ru lta ba kri ya pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:269: kun rdzob las kyi rigs bsnan pas bzhi la ye
NK103(pe)005:270: shes pa dpon dam tshig pa g.yog don dam par
NK103(pe)005:271: // spros pa dang bral bar lta ba u pa ya dang //
NK103(pe)005:272: kun rdzob tu snang ba rigs lnga la ye shes
NK103(pe)005:273: pa dang dam tshig pa grogs po'i tshul du tha
NK103(pe)005:274: dad mnyam po // don dam par rnam par snang
NK103(pe)005:275: mdzad chen po stong par lta ba yo ga ba
NK103(pe)005:276: dad mnyam po // dang // gsal ba lha yi rang bzhin bde //
NK103(pe)005:277: de nyid ngos gzung cis kyang stong pas //
NK103(pe)005:278: dbyer med du lta ba ma h+aa ba dang /
NK103(pe)005:279: de las grol ba'i bde ba chen por lta ba a nu dang //
NK103(pe)005:280: yod med gnyis gnyis med mu bzhi po kun tu ye nas rdzogs pa la //
NK103(pe)005:281: gcig kho na'i phyogs su lta ba de dag 'khrul pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)005:282: mu bzhi po thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rdzogs par lta ba lhun grub pa dang //
NK103(pe)005:283: mu bzhi gang gi yang mtha' ru ma red pa la //
NK103(pe)005:284: rang 'dod kyis phyogs su lta ba de 'khrul pas na //
NK103(pe)005:285: mu bzhi'i phyogs thams cad dang bral te ka nas dag par lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)005:286: drug po de dag kun bltar yod de mtha' drug gi yul la lta ba'o //
NK103(pe)005:287: byang chub kyi sems su chos kun mkhyen pa'i ye shes des //
NK103(pe)005:288: mu mtha' kun mkhyen kyang phyogs gcig pa'i yul du bltar med pa la rang gsal ba zhes //
NK103(pe)005:289: dgos pa'i dbang gis cir brtags kyang sgra ji bzhin pa der mi rtog pas //
NK103(pe)005:290: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par mu mtha' kun rang grol ba'o //
NK103(pe)005:291: de la yang ming grangs ni rtog pa nyid ye shes su //
NK103(pe)005:292: 'dus pas na lta ba'i dbang du rtogs shing //
NK103(pe)005:293: lta ba rtogs pas bsgrub bya don gyi snying po longs pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)005:294: lta ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rtogs pa nyid yin la //
NK103(pe)005:295: rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas de las 'da' ba med par gnas pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)005:296: lta ba'i dam tshig ni ye nas gnas pa'i don bsrungs pa yin cing //
NK103(pe)005:297: phyogs su 'dzin pa zhi la kun mkhyen gyi ye shes rgyas //
NK103(pe)005:298: shes sgrub kyi don 'dus pas dbang dngos po dang
NK103(pe)005:299: mtshan mar 'dzin pa tshar gcod pa drag po lta
NK103(pe)005:300: ba'i phrin las ni lhun grub yin la //
NK103(pe)005:301: yul med ye nas gsal ba kun mkhyen pa //
NK103(pe)005:302: yul du bltar med pa'i lta ba ni ye bltas su mthong la //
NK103(pe)005:303: rtogs nas de'i ngang las 'da' ba ma myong bas //
NK103(pe)005:304: lta ba'i sgom pa ni yengs pa dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)005:305: mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gag ba med par rol bas //
NK103(pe)005:306: lta ba'i spyod pa ni rang la rdzogs pa yin //
NK103(pe)005:307: rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)005:308: lta ba'i sa lam ni rang la gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:309: ye nas yin pa'i don rtogs pa las skyed dbyung du med pas //
NK103(pe)005:310: lta ba'i 'bras bu ni ye nas rang sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:311: klong brgyad po kun la yang de bzhin du ldog
NK103(pe)005:312: cha nas dgu dgur shes par gyis shig ces gdams
NK103(pe)005:313: so // dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes dang //
NK103(pe)005:314: 'gro ba rigs drug sems nyid kyi ma bcos pa dang gnyis //
NK103(pe)005:315: tha dad pa ma yin pa'i don gyis gcig pa la //
NK103(pe)005:316: bzang ngan mi gnas 0pas gdeng chen po dang ldan no //
NK103(pe)005:317: des 0na sems can gyi rtog pa ngan pas spang ba dang //
NK103(pe)005:318: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bzang ba yis sgrub par mi byed la //
NK103(pe)005:319: don dam kun rdzob dang 'khor 'das la sogs //
NK103(pe)005:320: pa 'og ma pas bzang ngan du bzung ba rnams la 'dir dgag sgrub med pa srog gi gnas //
NK103(pe)005:321: de yang las dang po pa ming la mos pas na g.yo ba'i nyams //
NK103(pe)005:322: don spyi la smon pa'i nyams cing don rang mtshan la 'jug pa'i nyams //
NK103(pe)005:323: nges par rtogs pa thob pa'i nyams cing de'i ngang la gnas pa'i nyams //
NK103(pe)005:324: rtogs pa goms pas klong du gyur nas bsgyub bya'i don mthar phyin pa'i nyams yin no //
NK103(pe)005:325: gnyid du rnal ba'i mthangs rmi lam du phyung ba'i sdug bsngal ba las //
NK103(pe)005:326: gnyid sad pas ma spangs par rang sar grol ba dang 'dra bar 'khrul pa rang grol ba'am //
NK103(pe)005:327: rgyal bu sprang por rkang 'khyams pa la rgyal por
NK103(pe)005:328: dbang bskur ba dang 'dra bar mngon sum du grub
NK103(pe)005:329: cing // smag gi mun rum la sgron me bteg
NK103(pe)005:330: pa yis gsal ba dang 'dra bar ma rig pa
NK103(pe)005:331: cing // rang gsal ba'o // rang gnas kyi ye shes tshig tsam las don du ma rtogs na //
NK103(pe)005:332: 'khrul pas rang bcings 1mu bzhi'i mthar lhung 1 zhing phyogs ris su 1bcad 111pas //
NK103(pe)005:333: rang gi rgyud sdug 1 bsngal la mnyam grol gyi
NK103(pe)005:334: don 2spangs te dgag sgrub kyi rtsol 3bas la ba
NK103(pe)005:335: // de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems su lta ba'o zhes gzhan sel gyi'o //
NK103(pe)005:336: de yi yon tan blo yis bsam gyis mi khyab kyang bsdu na //
NK103(pe)005:337: zhen drug gzhi'i sdug bsngal dang theg brgyad lam gyi rtsol ba'i nad las grol //
NK103(pe)005:339: bde ba chen por lhun gyis gnas pa ni rtogs pas yongs su rgyas pas //
NK103(pe)005:340: 'gro ba'i don ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba'o //
NK103(pe)005:341: rtogs pa de yi ngang la ma gnas na //
NK103(pe)005:342: dus bskal par rtsol sgrub kyi sdug bsngal dge tshogs ci la spyad kyang //
NK103(pe)005:343: bsgrubs pa'i don med par las 'bras kyi snying po phyung bas bskams te zad pa yin te //
NK103(pe)005:344: rang sa'i 'dod pa grub kyang 'bras bu mthar mi phyin pas //
NK103(pe)005:345: skye 'jig dang bcas pas 'khor ba nyid las 'da' ba med //
NK103(pe)005:346: pa'i skyon de bas na nan tan gyis lta ba rtogs pa shin tu gces bas 'bad par bya'o //
NK103(pe)005:347: dga' rab rdo rje bdag nyid ni ma rig pa'i gnas nas 'byung ba la //
NK103(pe)005:348: rtogs pa rin chen gdeng med pas gzhan thabs 'ga' yang //
NK103(pe)005:349: rnyed par ma gyur pa la 'byung ba 'i dus
NK103(pe)005:350: drug la bab pa'i tshe lha'i dbang pos phyogs bcu'i
NK103(pe)005:352: sku gsum gyi bka'i chu rgyun bdag la babs pas ma rig pa'i //
NK103(pe)005:353: dri ma dag nas rang byung ye shes kyi shes bya kun mkhyen cing yul med du gsal bas //
NK103(pe)005:354: 'khrul pa gzhan mthong nas de dag la snying rje skyes pas lta ba rtogs pa'i thabs bkod pa //
NK103(pe)005:355: 'di la brten nas sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi mig lta ba rnyed par shog cig /
NK103(pe)005:356: rtsom pa la ngal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro ba kun
NK103(pe)005:357: gyis kyang gnas lugs don rtogs par gyur cig pa'o
NK103(pe)005:358: // lta ba thams cad kyi yang rtse //
NK103(pe)005:359: sems med pa'i rin po che //
NK103(pe)005:360: lta dgongs thams cad kyi rtse mo mchog tu gyur pa /
NK103(pe)005:361: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ta dang /
NK103(pe)005:362: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa
NK103(pe)005:363: nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur cing
NK103(pe)005:364: zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)005:365: se'i ban+d+he 'byung ldan gyis mchan bu btab pa'o //
